definition: to grip forcefully/to clutch at/to guard/to control/to hold
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: This short term make-a-fast-buck philosophy has killed this country.
sentences.chinese: “謀取近利”這一指導思想已經扼殺了這個國家。

sentences.english: The colonialists tried in vain to crack down on( upon) that country's economy.
sentences.chinese: 殖民主義者妄圖扼殺那個國家的經濟。

sentences.english: But the ideals were stifled by Cixi and Guangxu was jailed in his own palace.
sentences.chinese: 但是，理想扼殺慈溪和光緒被關押在自己的宮殿。

sentences.english: We see corruption smothering entrepreneurship and good governance.
sentences.chinese: 我們看到腐敗扼殺了創業精神和良治。

sentences.english: It leaps onto Unit 03 and strangles it, breaking it's neck.
sentences.chinese: 它飛躍在單位03上並且扼殺它，打破它是脖子。

sentences.english: The third factor is the possibility that political tensions will smother Thailand's green shoots.
sentences.chinese: 第三個因素是政局的緊張可能會扼殺泰國的希望之苗。

sentences.english: They limit the spirit and enthusiasm of children.
sentences.chinese: 他們扼殺了孩子的精神和熱忱。

sentences.english: James reminds us that greed kills generosity.
sentences.chinese: 雅各提醒我們，貪財能扼殺慷慨樂善的心。

sentences.english: People despised it so much it nearly killed e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 人們如此討厭垃圾郵件，差點就扼殺了電子郵箱。

sentences.english: In China, nothing quite kills the romance like the threat of losing real estate.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，扼殺浪漫的罪魁禍首當屬房產歸屬權。

sentences.english: Use your head. don't kill bestiality online…
sentences.chinese: 動點腦筋，不要扼殺了動物網站的存在。

sentences.english: Sooner murder an infant in its cradle than nurse unacted desires.
sentences.chinese: 有慾望無行動等於把嬰兒扼殺在搖籃之中。

sentences.english: We disobey social protocol that stifles and stigmatizes personal freedom.
sentences.chinese: 我們服從社會和議定書，扼殺個人自由的烙印。

sentences.english: The yeah-but will kill your dreams.
sentences.chinese: 這句話，它會扼殺你很多夢想。

sentences.english: It's poor position sizing, along with not using a stop-loss, that kills the average investor.
sentences.chinese: 較差的倉位控制與不肯止蝕，將普通投資者扼殺。

sentences.english: Children's creativity may be stiffed in this manner.
sentences.chinese: 中國孩子的創造力可能就是這樣被扼殺的。

definition: to erase/to cover traces/to obliterate evidence/to expunge/to blot out/to suppress
to deprive/to expropriate/to strip (sb of his property)
to ignore/to neglect/to treat with contempt
to view as/to see as/to consider to be/to deem
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
